summary: high-quality ,high-resolution,handmade texture replacer for ebony ARMOUR
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b][color=red]Distribution permission[/color][/b]: This file is a [b]Nexus-exclusive release[/b], please respect my decision and DO NOT reupload it elsewhere... I did not give, nor want to give permission for any kind of reupload.[/size]

[size=5] HD Retexture for ebony Armor set and variants Plugin [/size]

  °°°  resolution 2048X2048 cuirass and shield 1024 helmet gloves and boots
 
  °°° As usual, everything has been redone from scratch.
  
  °°°  This work should be compatible with pretty much everything, meshes replacers ,nif puzzles ,body modification for both gender

  °°°  [b]INSTALLATION[/b]: chose which version you want to install ,black, gold or silver and use modmanager ...or.... open the chosen package with 7zip or winrar , drop \"textures\" inside data folder .

  °°°  [b]ABOUT \"DIFFERENTLY EBONY\"[/b]: Install the BLACK Replacer like wrote above, then install Differently Ebony simply extracting the archive content inside the DATA Folder, then activate the .esp.
Please read the Readme in the mod page for further informations, if you don\'t find what you need you can ask [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/427081]me (Modd3r)[/url] or post here.
Big thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=697047]DoubleH[/url] for the help provided in completing the plugin :)

  °°°  [b]OPEN FACED HELMET PATCH[/b]: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37766/?]Download here[/url] the patch made by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2695294/?]Gambit77[/url] to use Open Faced Helmet with Differently Ebony! Many thanks to Gambit77 for his support :)

  °°°  [b]\"DIFFERENTLY EBONY\" Changelog[/b]
1.0a
- Correct the cubemaps\' assignment to the additional meshes

[center][youtube]3rCrejq_TK4[/youtube] [youtube]lqkeJZut6Rs[/youtube] [youtube]-Gl-LIR7KGc[/youtube] [youtube]Gl-LIR7KGc[/youtube] [/center]
